text: Aur jo log eman laye woh kehtay hain koi soorat kiyon nazil nahi ki gaee? Phir jab koi saaf matlab wali soorat nazil ki jati hai aur iss mein qitaal ka ziker kiya jata hai to aap dekhtay hain jinn logon kay dilon mein beemari hai woh aap ki taraf iss tarah dekhtay hain jaisay uss shaks ki nazar hoti hai jiss per mot ki beyhoshi taari ho pus boht behtar tha unn kay liye
